column4: I changed monitors, went from a 17" AOC CRT to a 19" LCD Samsung 920n.  Ubotu referred me to a page that explains how to fix your resolution but rerunning detect did not work, i then manuall entered the Hor and Vert paramaters in xorg.conf and just crashed
I am wondering, can I copy xorg.conf from a dapper machine that was hooked up to the same hardware/
When you get it fixed, make a backup of your xorg for future ref
